Auckland City Mission finds ‘lethal levels’ of meth in donated lollies handed out in food parcels https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-city-mission-finds-lethal-levels-of-meth-in-donated-lollies-handed-out-in-food-parcels/JUWLGY5X4BDZLFINI6RCUGNETI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-city-mission-finds-lethal-levels-of-meth-in-donated-lollies-handed-out-in-food-parcels/JUWLGY5X4BDZLFINI6RCUGNETI/ Benjamin PlummerMission says it received an 'alert of concern' this afternoon. Photos / NZ Drug Foundation / Auckland City Mission

Government to give terminally ill Lake Alice psychiatric hospital abuse survivors ‘rapid’ $20,000 payment https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/government-announces-20000-rapid- payment-for-terminally-ill-lake-alice-psychiatric-hospital-abuse-survivors/FWBNQLC5UJAXZBRNTMVZLQGFPU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/government-announces-20000-rapid- payment-for-terminally-ill-lake-alice-psychiatric-hospital-abuse-survivors/FWBNQLC5UJAXZBRNTMVZLQGFPU/ Benjamin PlummerThe cash will be available for patients from the Lake Alice Child and Adolescent Unit. Tue, 13 Aug 2024 06:54:42 +0000 Terminally ill survivors of the Lake Alice Psychiatric Hospital Child and Adolescent Unit will receive urgent financial assistance from the Government.

Tue, 13 Aug 2024 06:28:37 +0000 On Monday, the Government announced a new benefit traffic light system and further changes to the social welfare system as part of wider reforms it says will reduce welfare dependency and get more people into work.
